title: Studio Apartment/Private Bathroom Plus All Utilities Included

Studio apartment rents for $1000 Monthly or $250 weekly or $500 biweekly (Plus a one time $1000 move in fee ) 6Month Lease/Month to Month
IT THEY GO FAST… CALL ASAP
THE WAITLIST FOR ROOMS IS NOW OPEN
AND WE HAVE 1 LOWER LEVEL PRIVATE STUDIO AVAILABLE NOW… don’t hesitate,
